meta.name: keyword
meta.content: jms, java, messaging, tibco, rendevzous, distributed computing

section.name: JAMSEL Framework
section.p: A framework for evaluating a subset of SQL92 conditional expression syntax. Specifically, the framework is a complete implementation of the JMS 1.1 selector specification

ol.li: Complete implementation of JMS 1.1 selector specification.

section.p: Please read the whitepaper for a detailed description of the framework.
